entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. 60 percent chance of wet flurries over southwestern sections. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening then changing to snow overnight. Wet flurries over southwestern sections this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over southwestern sections. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
